title: Versatile, flexible rice starchâ€“graphene oxide bio-nanocomposites
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00419A, Paper
Prathmesh Bhadane, Abhijit Mishra
In light of the pressing global issues of plastic and water pollution, this study seeks a singular solution by exploring the remarkable potential of graphene oxide (GO) as a nanomaterial in rice starch-GO bio-nano composites.
